attributes.action: Start a petition to halt the random removal of historic statutes in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This removal of statutes is undermining the UK History without a fair review
attributes.background: Intervene in stopping random removal of Historical Statutes that are being targeted by minority groups

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814

You may also wish to sign one or more of the following petitions relating to statues and monuments: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325673
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326361
